Class Invitations

  • java.lang.Object
    • clcondorcet.olympa.fr.olympaBot.Functions.Invitations

  • public class Invitations
extends java.lang.Object
    Invitations manager. Events: - GuildMemberJoinEvent (integrated in WelcomeMessages) - GuildMemberLeaveEvent Commands: -

    0.0.3
    Author:
    clcondorcet

      • stockAllGuildsInvites

        public static void stockAllGuildsInvites()
        Stock all the invites of a all joined guilds. That wont work for a guild if the bot doesn't have the permission "MANAGE_SERVER" (this will be log an error)

      • addBonusCommand

        public static boolean addBonusCommand(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.TextChannel channel,
                                      net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User author,
                                      java.lang.String[] cmd)
        Change the bonus invites of a member in the specified guild. And send a custom message.
        Parameters:
        channel - The channel where the command is send.
        author - The author of the command.
        cmd - The message of the command.
        Returns:
        True when the change occure, False when there is an error
